short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your friends list bigger and valuable with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The process of finding and connecting with specific, keyword-based Facebook friends is automated and sped up by Friend Multiplier.

With a single click, you can enhance and automate your friend list.

If you don't have time to send friend requests manually, this is the tool for you.

You can target the people you're attracting by selecting from the various groups.

You can also do this based on posts and either reactions or comments to those posts.

You can get even more qualified people by using keywords and negative keywords to filter in the people you want to connect with and filter out the ones who aren't a good fit for your target audience.

There's also the option to automatically respond to people who send you friend requests, with the message modifying depending on whether you accept or decline their invitation.

You can also send out an automated message when someone sends you a friend request.

Please note this is an authorized white label of the Chrome Extension "Friend Connector" by Tier5.
